sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Shaggydog is the fiercest and least-disciplined of the five wolves, reflecting Rickon's willful nature. Bran thinks the wolf's name is stupid, but this might be expected as Rickon was only three years old when he named him, and only six in the TV series. "Shaggy" soon becomes a preferred name. He is described as black, with bright green eyes.
